caravanStays.title: Caravan Stays

meetthealpacas.name: Meet the Alpacas
meetthealpacas.description: Get up close with our alpaca herd
meetthealpacas.details: Experience a unique opportunity to meet our friendly alpaca herd.
meetthealpacas.highlights: Meet our friendly alpacas and learn about their unique personalities. You'll get to interact with the herd, learn about alpaca care, and have plenty of photo opportunities.
meetthealpacas.requirements: Comfortable walking shoes, weather-appropriate clothing. Camera optional. Advance booking required.

alpacawalks.name: Alpaca Walks
alpacawalks.description: Take a walk with an alpaca companion
alpacawalks.details: Join us for a peaceful walk through scenic trails with your own alpaca companion.
alpacawalks.highlights: Individual walk with an alpaca, scenic routes, learn to handle alpacas, photo opportunities. Experience the joy of walking with these gentle creatures while enjoying beautiful surroundings.
alpacawalks.requirements: Comfortable walking shoes, weather appropriate clothing, minimum age: 6 years, advance booking required. Basic fitness level needed for walking activity.

privatealpacasafari.name: Private Alpaca Safari
privatealpacasafari.details: Enjoy an exclusive experience with our alpacas in a private setting.
privatealpacasafari.highlights: Private guide, customized experience, extended time with alpacas, special photo opportunities. Enjoy a personalized journey with our alpacas tailored to your group's interests.
privatealpacasafari.requirements: Comfortable walking shoes, weather appropriate clothing, advance booking required, maximum group size: 6 people. Perfect for families and small groups.

hero.title: Welcome to Zagroda Alpakoterapii
hero.subtitle: Experience the magic of alpaca therapy in our peaceful farm setting

cozyfarmhouserooms.name: Cozy Farmhouse Rooms
cozyfarmhouserooms.description: Sleep tight in our comfy farmhouse!

micky.name: Micky
micky.character: Micky is the gentle leader of our alpaca herd, known for his calm demeanor and friendly nature.

stories.0: Micky once helped a shy child overcome their fears by approaching them with gentle curiosity.
stories.1: He's known for his unique humming sound that he makes when he's happy.

elvis.name: Elvis
elvis.character: Elvis is the showman of the group, always ready to entertain visitors with his charming personality.

stories.0: Elvis loves to dance in the meadow, especially during sunset.
stories.1: He has a special talent for making children laugh with his silly expressions.

ricky.name: Ricky
ricky.character: Ricky is the adventurous one, always curious and eager to explore new things.

stories.0: Ricky once discovered a hidden apple tree and now loves to climb it whenever he can.
stories.1: He has a knack for finding the most interesting spots on the farm.

teddy.name: Teddy
teddy.character: Teddy is the gentle giant of the group. Despite his size, he's incredibly gentle and patient, especially with young children.
stories: Teddy once stood perfectly still for an hour while a young artist painted his portrait during a therapy session.
During winter, Teddy likes to roll in the snow, creating 'alpaca angels' that always make visitors laugh.

suri.name: Suri
suri.character: Suri is the fashionista of the group. Her unique coat always draws attention, and she seems to enjoy being admired.
stories: During a shearing session, Suri kept trying to style her wool into different 'hairdos', much to the amusement of the shearers.
Suri has a talent for finding the sunniest spots in the field, and the other alpacas often follow her lead for the best sunbathing locations.

freddy.name: Freddy
freddy.character: Freddy is the peacekeeper of the group. He has a calm demeanor and often mediates when there's any tension among the other alpacas.
stories: Once, when two younger alpacas were squabbling over a favorite toy, Freddy intervened by bringing them each a different toy, resolving the conflict.
Freddy has a unique way of communicating with humans, using different humming tones that the regular visitors have started to recognize and interpret.

madonna.name: Madonna
madonna.character: Madonna is the diva of the goat herd. She loves attention and often 'sings' to visitors.

stories.0: Madonna once stole a visitor's hat and wore it around the farm for an entire day.
stories.1: She has a habit of standing on the highest point of any structure, as if posing for a photo shoot.

ladygaga.name: Lady Gaga
ladygaga.character: Lady Gaga is known for her unique 'fashion sense', often found wearing flowers or leaves in her fur.

stories.0: Lady Gaga once organized a 'goat parade' where she led the entire herd in a line around the farm.
stories.1: She has a special talent for finding the tastiest leaves and will share them with her goat friends.

nella.name: Nella
nella.character: Nella is the gentle soul of the group. She's particularly good with children and loves cuddles.

stories.0: Nella once comforted a crying child by nuzzling up to them and staying by their side until they smiled.
stories.1: She has a unique friendship with one of the farm cats and they can often be found napping together in the sun.

baron.name: Baron
baron.character: Baron is the dignified leader of the goat herd. He's calm, wise, and protective of the others.

stories.0: Baron once alerted the farmers to a broken fence by repeatedly headbutting the barn door until someone came to check.
stories.1: He has a unique habit of 'escorting' visitors around the farm, walking beside them like a tour guide.
